body_html:
I just checked, and it builds fine for me with API 24. In any case you're running into native compilation errors, not a Java problem, so it should be a non-issue.

The error in your log output seems to be re2-related (@protobuf appears nowhere in the pasted log). Because the failing module varies, this could be a general workspace issue, with the error depending on which module it tries to build first.

How did you initialize your repo? I just tested, and the following works for me at API 24:

git clone --recursive https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
<edit WORKSPACE>
bazel build -s //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo -s --verbose_failures

body:
I just checked, and it builds fine for me with API 24. In any case you're running into native compilation errors, not a Java problem, so it should be a non-issue.

The error in your log output seems to be re2-related (@protobuf appears nowhere in the pasted log). Because the failing module varies, this could be a general workspace issue, with the error depending on which module it tries to build first.

How did you initialize your repo? I just tested, and the following works for me at API 24:

```
git clone --recursive https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
<edit WORKSPACE>
bazel build -s //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo -s --verbose_failures
```
